file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 21-51-09-05 - PACK DUCT OVERTEMPERATURE SWITCH - ADJUSTMENT/TEST

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PACK DUCT OVERTEMPERATURE SWITCH - ADJUSTMENT/TEST EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the functional check of the cooling-pack duct overtemperature switch. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY COOLING-PACK DUCT OVERTEMPERA- ALL 21-51-09-700-801-A ♦ TURE SWITCH - FUNCTIONAL CHECK EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 21-51-09 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-51-09-700-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. COOLING-PACK DUCT OVERTEMPERATURE SWITCH - FUNCTIONAL CHECK A. General (1) To do the functional check of the cooling-pack duct overtemperature switch, refer toHamilton Sundstrand CMM 21-61-69. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - PACK DUCT OVERTEMPERATURE SWITCH - RE- AMM TASK 21-51-09-000-801-A/400 MOVAL PACK DUCT OVERTEMPERATURE SWITCH - IN- AMM TASK 21-51-09-400-801-A/400 STALLATION Hamilton Sundstrand CMM 21-61-69 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 191 191EL Left side of the wing-to-fuselage fairing 191 191FR Right side of the wing-to-fuselage fairing D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task LH or RH cooling pack I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the access panel(s) AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 as applicable: • 191EL (duct overtemperature switch of the LH cooling pack). • 191FR (duct overtemperature switch of the RH cooling pack). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 21-51-09 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Remove the cooling-pack duct overtemperature switch from the aircraft (Refer to AMM TASK 21-51-09-000-801-A/400). J. Switch Functional Check SUBTASK 720-002-A (1) Do the functional check of the switch. Refer to Hamilton Sundstrand CMM 21-61-69. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the cooling-pack duct overtemperature switch in the aircraft (Refer to AMM TASK 21-51-09-400-801-A/400). (2) Install the access panel(s) (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100), as applicable: • 191EL (duct overtemperature switch of the LH cooling pack). • 191FR (duct overtemperature switch of the RH cooling pack).
